branding.title: ValidFlow is built on the shoulders of giants

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is ValidFlow
introduce.label: Introduction
introduce.description: ValidFlow is a user insights platform for the AI era. Traditional A/B testing methods are time-consuming, expensive, and difficult to execute. ValidFlow breaks down these barriers and empowers innovators to build excellent products.

items.title: Design Experiments
items.description: Upload research objectives, AI automatically generates professional user experiment plans with customizable editing support.

items.title: User Interviews
items.description: AI conducts in-depth interviews, communicating with real or simulated users through video calls.

items.title: Behavioral Insights
items.description: Record user product usage behavior, collect comprehensive interview data and authentic feedback.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: What We Can Help You Solve
benefit.label: Value
benefit.description: Whatever user insight challenges you face, ValidFlow can provide effective solutions.

items.title: Product Iteration
items.description: Shorten product development cycles through rapid user feedback and requirement validation.

items.title: Enhanced Marketing
items.description: More precisely target customer segments, optimize marketing messages and channels.

items.title: Budget Research
items.description: Provide powerful, user-friendly tools for resource-constrained innovation teams and professionals.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Gain User Insights with ValidFlow
usage.description: Gain deep user insights through four simple steps:

items.title: Design Experiments
items.description: Upload your research objectives, AI automatically generates professional user experiment plans.

items.title: Conduct Interviews

items.title: Intelligent Analysis
items.description: AI intelligently analyzes collected user insight data using multiple reasoning approaches.

items.title: Product Decisions
items.description: AI performs qualitative and quantitative analysis, providing actionable product optimization recommendations.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About ValidFlow
faq.description: Have other questions? Contact us through Discord or email.

items.title: What is ValidFlow?
items.description: ValidFlow is an AI-driven user insights platform that helps product teams gain deep user insights through intelligent experiment design, user interviews, and behavioral analysis.

items.title: How does ValidFlow conduct user interviews?
items.description: Our AI agents can conduct in-depth interviews with real users or simulated users, collecting authentic feedback and behavioral data through video calls.

items.title: How accurate are the analysis results?
items.description: Our AI analysis accuracy reaches 95%, combining qualitative and quantitative analysis methods to provide actionable product optimization recommendations.

items.title: What team sizes is it suitable for?
items.description: ValidFlow is suitable for various scales from independent developers to large product teams, and we provide flexible collaboration features.

items.title: How is data security ensured?
items.description: We adopt enterprise-level security standards, all user data is encrypted, and we strictly comply with data privacy protection regulations.

items.title: Can I customize templates to match my brand?
items.description: Absolutely! All ValidFlow templates are fully customizable. You can modify design, features, and functionality to match your brand identity and specific business requirements while maintaining the powerful underlying infrastructure.
